content: mary ellen s cowl designed by ruthann flor/four hearts design mary ellen s cowl is an oversized cowl with a chevron design this cowl has the added versatility that it can be worn down around the neck and up as a hood finished measurements 30 circumference 16 high materials berroco comfort dk yarn 50% super fine nylon/50% super fine acrylic approximately 430 yards care instructions machine wash inside out on gentle cycle with warm water no bleach tumble dry on low heat do not over dry do not iron do not bleach needles size us 7 4 5 mm 24 circular needles or size to obtain gauge gauge 5 stitches x 8 row in stockinette stitches = 1 inch special terms k2tog knit 2 stitches together ssk slip the next 2 stitches one at a time as if to knit to the right needle insert the left needle into the fronts of these two stitches and knit them together yo yarn over cowl instructions long tail cast on 140 stitches join to beginning working in the round being careful to not twist the piece place a marker at the beginning of the round knit 2 purl 2 for five row to create the edge ribbing on fifth row add a stitch marker every 10 stitches this will be a lifesaver when you start the pattern
